title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Elementary Education Software Through Problem-Based Animation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary computer skills and primary mathematics education experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Design of five or more problem-based animated learning modules suitable for elementary mathematics education
Development of instructional strategies that induce cognitive skill improvement through animation-based task-solving processes
Prototyping and evaluation of educational software implementable in smartphone environments

Learners Perform Three Project-Based Assessments During a Six-Month Course, Analyze AI Model Performance Metrics (Accuracy, F1-Score, etc.) in Each Project, Write a Three-Page A4 Educational Effectiveness Analysis Report, and Achieve Over 4 Points (Out of 5) in at Least Four of the Five Report Evaluation Rubric Items

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
